Text: Torrent good  but the software is not good. I tried it and wasn't able to pick up a simple txt file I had just deleted from my usb key. Other application picked it up right away.

Fuck I just accidentally deleted 28GB's worth of shit and this app is currently saving my ass.

sam_hig05 It's got me fucked how you lose a simple text file when I have 90,000 files being recovered right now. Was your hard drive made this century?

Takster, what ya think of 285GB, 216500 files??

Hope it'll work... :s

Same as v4.4.x :

I get a 'Divide by Zero' error as soon as the program finishes the search.

I can't click on the left side for file type selection and the 'Save Files' button is greyed out.

Less than a minute later, the program just closes, No error message.
